title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Keep your kitchen clean and odor-free with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. This pack of 50 white trash bags is designed to hold up to 13 gallons of waste, making them the perfect companion for your kitchen bin.

Crafted from tear-resistant white plastic, the Flextra strength technology ensures that these bags can handle the toughest of kitchen waste without leaking or tearing. The sturdy red drawstring closure makes sealing and transporting the bags a breeze, locking in contents and allowing for a convenient, mess-free disposal.

These unscented bags are ideal for those who prefer a fragrance-free experience or have sensitivities to scents. The neutral white color blends seamlessly with any kitchen decor, keeping your space looking clean and tidy.

Plus, with Alexa voice shopping compatibility, reordering your Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags is as simple as saying the word. Never run out of trash bags again with this easy and efficient feature.

Experience the combination of durability, convenience, and smart technology with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Your kitchen will thank you!

**Introducing the Ultimate Clean-Up Companion: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags!**

Make tidying up a breeze with the unparalleled strength and convenience of the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Say goodbye to spills, tears, and the hassle of poorly fitting bags with this pack of 50 robust trash companions.

**Key Features:**

- **Exceptional Capacity:** Each bag boasts a 13-gallon capacity, perfectly sized for your kitchen trash needs.
- **Tear-Resistant Technology:** Crafted from high-quality white plastic, these bags feature Flex-tra strength, making them resilient against punctures and rips.
- **Convenient Closure:** The red drawstring closure ensures a secure shut, making it easy to tie, lift, and carry without any mess or stress.
- **Unscented Freshness:** Keeping it simple and fragrance-free for those who prefer a clean yet discreet presence in their kitchen.
- **Easy Shopping Experience:** Replenishing your stock is as easy as saying "Alexa, order Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Trash Bags," thanks to the Alexa voice shopping feature.

Whether you're cleaning up after a big meal or disposing of everyday waste, these bags are your go-to solution for a tidy kitchen. The 50-count box ensures you're well-stocked for all of life's messy moments. The sleek white bags with a pop of red from the drawstring add a touch of style to your trash can.

Choose Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags for a reliable, no-fuss clean-up. Order yours today and experience the perfect blend of performance and convenience!

**Keep Your Kitchen Clean and Fresh with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags**

Say goodbye to messes and hello to a spotless kitchen with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags.
